General.Name: Incross Co. Ltd
General.Description: Incross Co., Ltd. engages in mobile advertising business in South Korea. It offers Dawin, a video and mobile display ad network; China AD, a platform that provides integrated marketing optimization solutions; and digital ad service through the online/mobile ad solution and platform. It also provides ad products and platform planning, technological support for development and maintenance, and other services, as well as managing services for ONE store and T freemium plus. Incross Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: KyeongDong pharm company, Seoul, South Korea, 151-912
